desc: One of my commit sha starts with "a".
One of my commit sha starts with "ab".
One of my commit sha starts with "abc".
I used a word "fuck" in my commit message.
body: Commits: - 716edb5: fixed ie fuck schei√üe - 101c1f3: fuck camelcase - cb9dae4: fuck camelcase

desc: I pushed a commit with "cafe" 7 times.
I rolled before Covid-19: Survivor of the Great TP Shortage
I pushed a commit with "dead" 8 times.
I committed on the day Doctor Emmett Brown invented the flux capacitor!
I made an epic commit with a message over 500 chars.

body:
My favorite commit message words are:

1. fix (used 2290 times)
2. add (used 1607 times)
3. update (used 1238 times)
4. added (used 1036 times)
5. merge (used 947 times)
Commits: - 7bb232e: fix namespace issues - a04a41c: fix parse query - 2b33b14: fix check - 622bbb2: fix rewrite rules - 2b24639: fix namespace issue
Commits: - 40f8cb4: fix typo - 98f31e9: fix const and buttons for M5Sticks

Commits: - b022733: Fix: Properly traverse the object hierarchy to get the ID (#1518) - 6b40f0d: Fix: Do not send self-replies (#1517) * Fix: Do not send self-replies * Add changelog * fix phpcs * improve tests props @obenland - 7e1c9e1: Fix: Delete Undone comments instead of trashing them (#1520) * Fix: Delete Undone comments instead of trashing them * Add changelog --------- Co-authored-by: Automattic Bot - 9363001: Fix: Set proper default, to show Welcome screen by default (#1512)

Commits: - 9ae732f: Fix: Use specified time formatting for Outbox Activities (#1537) * Fix timestamp for Outbox Activities * Add changelog * Add const - 217e98c: Fix: Default value for empty `movedTo` field (#1539) * Fix: Default value for empty `movedTo` field * Add changelog * fix phpcs issues * Add unit test - 30a0053: Fix: Post Interactions settings (#1540)

Commits: - 6e7ab31: fixed tag-generation - da9b934: fixed response - 32f635f: fixed response - 694cbeb: fixed get_indienews_xyz_url - 3d8b49f: fixed category link - e326305: fixed indieweb.xyz integration

desc: Happy February 29th! I committed on a Leap Day!
When I delete code, I delete a lot.
When I delete code, I delete a lot.

body: I use words like "thanks" and "please" in my issues: - #15: Problems with missing "mentions"... - #140: `admin_register_settings` is not working - #11: readme - #71: add container - #139: The extension page throws some warnings And many more...

desc: I have participated in pull requests with 5 or more people
body: Pull requests: - #183: Add filter to modify WP_Query arguments

desc: I committed on the Halloween! Boo!
